musicAPI.key: Paste the Token accepted for your MusicAPI instance.
musicAPI.location: Place the URL/IP & PORT of where the service runs.

cacheAPI.key: Paste the Token accepted for your CacheAPI instance.
cacheAPI.location: Place the URL/IP & PORT of where the service runs.

uptimeReport.location: Place the designated URL for Nyx to ping on a recurring basis to report that they are functioning well.
uptimeReport.interval: How many minutes in between pings? (default: 1)

elevated: Put your own Discord ID to gain access to secret commands!
